info.title: Order Management
info.description: Documentation of the 1NCE API for Order Management.

get.description: Get a complete list of all 1NCE orders for the given account.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Number index of the requested order list page.  Use this parameter to iterate through all orders on the different pages. The total amount of pages is listed in the response header.

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: Defines the size of a page, the number of individual orders listed on one page. The maximum allowed value is 10.

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sort the order list by specific keys (order_number, order_status and/or order_date) in a comma seperated list. The default is order_number if no paramter is given.

post.description: Trigger an order using a POST request.

requestBody.description: Detail prameters about the to be placed order.

get.description: Get a single Order, identified by its order_number.

parameters.name: order_number
parameters.description: Order number identifying one specific order.

Additional_Order.title: Additional Order

products.description: The specific products to be ordered.

customer_reference.description: Optional customer-specific reference for the order.

Additional_Order.description: Parameters of the order to be placed.

DeliveryAddress.title: Delivery Address

salutation.description: Salutation, supported values are '1' for 'Mr' and '2' for 'Ms'.

DeliveryAddress.description: Address where the products of the order should be delivered to. If no additional address is provided here, the ordered products will be sent to the existing single delivery address. If more than one default delivery address is configured in the 1NCE organization, please provide a valid shipping address in the order request.

href.description: Link for getting details about the specific SIM.

order_number.description: Order Number, a unique numerical identifier for a order.

order_type.description: The order type indicates whether this is a first order, additional order or a topup.

order_date.description: Date when the order was placed.

order_status.description: Current status of the ordering process.

invoice_number.description: Invoice Number, a unique alphanumerical identifier for the corresponding order invoice.

invoice_amount.description: The gross value which this order amounts to, as printed on the invoice.

currency.description: ISO 4217 currency code used for the invoice amount.

sims.description: List of SIMs included or affected by this order.

products.description: Product id and quantity of ordered products.

Ordered_product.title: Product Order

productId.description: Specific id of the product to be ordered. For reference, check past orders or the product API call for avaliable product ids.

quantity.description: Quantity to be ordered of the given product.

Ordered_product.description: Product id and order quantity of the specific product.

Product_information.title: Product Information

product_id.description: Specific id of the product ordered. For reference, check past orders or the product API call for avaliable product ids.

quantity.description: Quantity of SIMs with this product id ordered.

Product_information.description: General information about an ordered product

BearerAuthentication.description: Bearer Authentication Token used to gain access to the 1NCE API. Please refer to the Open Authorization (/oauth/token) request for obtaining a Bearer Token.
